thread.title: AWKWARD! Ben Shapiro nails Leftists whining about Trump’s ‘widow prop’ with 2 pics Hillary will hate
thread.title_full: AWKWARD! Ben Shapiro nails Leftists whining about Trump’s ‘widow prop’ with 2 pics Hillary will hate

author: Sam J.
title: AWKWARD! Ben Shapiro nails Leftists whining about Trump’s ‘widow prop’ with 2 pics Hillary will hate
text:
Trump’s ‘widow prop’   Posted at 10:53 am on March 2, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Ever since President Trump’s speech, which featured a very powerful moment around Carryn Owens, the widow of Chief Petty Officer William Ryan Owens, the Left has been preening on about how Trump supposedly used the widow as a prop. Horrible comments flooded Twitter, attacking not only the president but the widow herself. 
Of course as with all things Democrat, they are YUGE hypocrites: Leftists: Trump used a Gold Star widow as a political prop!One picture is last year's DNC. The other is just before the 2012 election. pic.twitter.com/FNitHP04q7 
— Ben Shapiro (@benshapiro) March 1, 2017 
Huh, props? Oh wait, it’s ok when they do it, right? 
Chalk it up to more of their mantra, “Do as they say, not as they do.”
